unit.name: Orca
unit.notes: May transport twelve Fire Warriors, Pathfinders, XV15 Stealth Battlesuits, Gun Drones, Broadsides, Kroot Warriors, Kroot Master Shaper and Kroot Hounds. XV8 Crisis, XV88 Broadside and XV95 Ghostkeel Battlesuits counts as two units each. May also carry up to two Gun Drones in addition to any other cargo.
unit.crit: The Orca and all units aboard are destroyed.

unit.name: Custodian Class Battleship
unit.notes: May transport 18 of the following units and the units being transported on them: Orca, Manta. Mantas count as thee units each. Spec[*]: A Gravitic Tracer Salvo may be fired at a marked formation of any type.

unit.name: Protector Class Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport six of the following units and the units being transported on them: Orca, Manta. Mantas count as thee units each. Spec[*]: A Gravitic Tracer Salvo may be fired at a marked formation of any type.

unit.name: Protector II Class Cruiser
unit.notes: Must select either Gravitic Tracer Salvo OR two Pin-Point attacks at the start of the battle. May transport six of the following units and the units being transported on them: Orca, Manta. Mantas count as thee units each. Spec[*]: A Gravitic Tracer Salvo may be fired at a marked formation of any type.
